ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.content:
Cacao Butter, Turmeric Extract*, Ceylon Cinnamon*, GABA, L-Theanine, Tri-Magnesium, Mucuna Extract*, Long Pepper Extract*

*ORGANIC

brew-guide.title: Brew Guide
brew-guide.content:
Add 1 heaped Tbsp (12.5g) to 200-250ml of warm milk of choice. Do not boil. Allow time to melt and merge. 
 To froth, mix in a blender, plunge up and down vigorously in a French press, or shake in a jar.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days. Domestic shipping takes 3-5 business days, international shipping varies by location. All packages are carefully wrapped and sealed to maintain the product's integrity during transit.
